edu.xtec.jclic.boxes

Class ActiveBagContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.xtec.jclic.boxes.ActiveBagContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Domable

    public class ActiveBagContent
extends Object
implements Domable
    This class stores a collection of ActiveBoxContent objects, currently in a ArrayList, and provides methods to manage it. The two main members of ActiveBagContent are the Shaper, responsible of determining the position and shape of each ActiveBox based on it, and the BoxBase, that provides a common visual style.
    Version:
    13.09.09
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)
